name: AssignRolesToUser
description:
Assign roles to a user in the system.

Use this tool to assign one or more roles to a specific user, allowing flexibility in user permissions and access control.

parameters.name: user_name
parameters.description: The name or identifier of the user to assign roles to.

parameters.name: assigned_roles
parameters.description: List of roles to assign to the specified user. Each role should be a string.

value_schema.description: The roles that are assigned to the specified user.

parameters.name: user_type
parameters.description: Specify the user type. Choose 'db' for Weaviate managed users or 'oidc' for users managed by an external OIDC provider.

value_schema.description: The type of the user. `db` users are managed by Weaviate, `oidc` users are managed by an external OIDC provider.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the weaviate API.

parameters.name: roles
parameters.description: The roles that are assigned to the specified user.

value_schema.description: The roles that are assigned to the specified user.

parameters.name: userType
parameters.description: The type of the user. `db` users are managed by Weaviate, `oidc` users are managed by an external OIDC provider.

value_schema.description: The type of the user. `db` users are managed by Weaviate, `oidc` users are managed by an external OIDC provider.
